alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Jefferson; Shelby (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 22 at 10:02PM CDT until March 24 at 5:35AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Alabama... Cahaba River Near Cahaba Heights affecting Bibb, Jefferson and Shelby Counties. .Heavy rainfall over the last 24 hours and additional expected rainfall will cause rises over the Cahaba River near Cahaba Heights and a flood warning is now in effect. Another statement will be issued by Wednesday afternoon, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cahaba River Near Cahaba Heights. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Flooding of some commercial property in the area begins as stages continues to rise. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 2.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 17.3 feet Wednesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
